title: Vistaril
description: Managing MS can often involve a variety of medications that target different aspects of the disease. Learn more about medications for MS and symptom treatment.
cleaned_text: - Brand Name: Vistaril - Chemical Name: hydroxyzine (hye-DROX-I-zeen) - Usage in MS: Paroxysmal Itching - Generic Available: Yes Description Hydroxyzine is an antihistamine used to relieve or prevent the symptoms of allergy. In MS it is used to relieve sensory symptoms, including itching or dysesthesias (burning sensations). Click [here](http://www.nlm.nih.gov/medlineplus/druginfo/meds/a682866.html)
